title: How to watch TV without any set top box - Quora

response.answer_text: How do you watch TV without a set-top box? This is really really easy. See of you have an antenna on your house. If you’re not certain, they look something like this:  If you haven’t, get one installed. Then connect it to your TV, switch on, and select “First time installation” or similar from the menu. It will take a few minutes to do its stuff, and then present you with a list of all the channels available in your area. (I’m assuming you have a fairly new TV, less then say 15 years old. An old analogue-only set will still need a box).

Get yourself a chromecast device (hope you have a HD ready TV) and subscribe to online streaming services like VOOT, HOTSTAR, AMAZON PRIME video, netflix, dependig on your choice of tv. cast the content from your phone to tv and enjoy. There are almost all tv channels available streaming online and so much more content. many are even free. I am assuming since your are using qoura you do have access to internet.
